Author: Marksam, Lumbud84
Description: Check off monitors based off of their colors, the number on their screens, amount and color of indicator lights, and connections to other monitors. All in a specific order. Tags: 15-monitors, connections, numbers, lights.
Name: Connected Monitors

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask about the number on every monitor, the color of each indicator, and if the indicator was flashing or not.
